about_the_game:
This is the free Prologue of Crack it Up!
In this version, you will be able to complete your first collection and experience the main mechanics of the game.
Don't forget to add the complete game to your wishlist to get notified when the game is released!



Use your computer to order different types of booster packs from an online store. Open one pack after another in this relaxing card collection game.



  • Buy packs from different collections.
  • Premium booster packs with high chance of exclusive rare variants.
  • Booster boxes with a lot of packs for less money.
  • Relaxing pack opening gameplay.


As an avid card collector, you will end up with a big collection of cards, sell your duplicates and your rarest cards for profit in a webpage. Manage your economy and get the best deals in a changing trading card market.



  • Use your retro computer to sell cards in an online store.
  • A dynamic card market, the price of the cards change over time, sell at the right time to maximize your profit.
  • Manage your economy, ¿Will you sell that rare card for a lot of money or will you keep it for your collection?


As a card collecting enthusiast you will have different collections to complete, each one with hundreds of cards and rare variants with high value.



  • Complete up to 5 different card collections.
  • Hundreds of cards with rare variants.
  • Scroll through your collection albums and inspect your precious trading cards.

In this version, you will be able to complete your first collection and experience the main mechanics of the game.
Don't forget to add the complete game to your wishlist to get notified when the game is released!

name: Crack it Up! - Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is the free Prologue of Crack it Up!, a trading card collecting game. Order booster packs from your 90s computer, crack them up, sell your duplicates and rarest cards for profit and complete your collections!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
